# PLAYER::SET_PLAYER_TEAM

## Summary
Set the players current team

## Parameters
* **PLAYER_INDEX** player
* **INT** team

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Set player team on deathmatch and last team standing..
